Player History
Drove in 6 runs against Milwaukee on 6/1/1965...
Signed as a free agent by Texas on 2/1/1967 to a 5-year deal worth $14,100,000 per year...
Was selected to the 1967 Allstar game...
Won Batter of the Month award on 8/1/1967, hitting .370 with 8 HR, 22 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 5/1/1968, hitting .314 with 11 HR, 35 RBI...
Had 5 hits with 8 RBI against Detroit on 5/2/1968...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/5/1968, hitting .423 with 4 HR, 15 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/26/1968, hitting .476 with 5 HR, 16 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 6/1/1968, hitting .340 with 10 HR, 36 RBI...
Was selected to the 1968 Allstar game...
Drove in 6 runs against Cleveland on 7/19/1968...
Sets a new season AL-Record for RBI with 142 on 9/19/1968...
Hit for the cycle against Oakland on 6/25/1969...
Was selected to the 1969 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/18/1969, hitting .414 with 4 HR, 12 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 5/1/1970, hitting .330 with 7 HR, 27 RBI...
Was selected to the 1970 Allstar game...
Had 5 hits with 4 RBI against New York (A) on 7/21/1970...
Won Batter of the Month award on 9/1/1970, hitting .311 with 7 HR, 21 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/19/1971, hitting .500 with 3 HR, 11 RBI...
Was selected to the 1971 Allstar game...
Injured on 8/15/1971 with a Broken Cheekbone, out for 5 weeks...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/17/1972, hitting .440 with 3 HR, 9 RBI...
Hit 3 homeruns against Baltimore, driving in 5 runs on 9/2/1972...
Won World Series with Texas in 1972...
Was selected to the 1973 Allstar game...
Had 2000th career hit on 4/5/1975, off Mike Davison (MIN)...
Signed as a free agent by Texas on 2/11/1976 to a 1-year deal worth $5,000,000 per year...
